sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Tr, Td, TdMiddle, TdRight, TextContainer, MessageContainer, Button, } from './elements' const ListItem = ({ item, resolveHandler, blockHandler }) => ( Id: {item.id} State: {item.state} {/* Details */} Type: {item.payload.reportType} Message: {item.payload.message} {item.isHiddenFromUsers ? 'hidden from users' : ''} ) export default ListItem
